source: TEXT_STMBDZ119_02669_SEQ_00<tab>A teahouse serving girl of Kugane is at her wit's end due to the incessant repetitions of an ebrious citizen.
target: TEXT_STMBDZ119_02669_SEQ_00<tab>Die Magd des Teehauses wird von einem betrunkenen Mann belästigt.

source: TEXT_STMBDZ119_02669_TODO_01<tab>Dump the pail of cold well water on the fabulously foxed fellow.
target: TEXT_STMBDZ119_02669_TODO_01<tab>Dem betrunkenen Mann das kühle Brunnenwasser übergießen

source: TEXT_STMBDZ119_02669_TODO_02<tab>Speak with the teahouse serving girl.
TEXT_STMBDZ119_02669_TEAHOUSE02669_000_000<tab>Enough! I can't stand it anymore. How many times are you going to recant the same old tired tale!?
target: TEXT_STMBDZ119_02669_TEAHOUSE02669_000_000<tab>Jetzt reicht es mir aber! Dein Gebrabbel ist überhaupt nicht zu verstehen.

source: TEXT_STMBDZ119_02669_DRANKER02669_000_001<tab>Shut your mouth and open your earsh, you little bint! Thish shtatue is Zuiko of Clan Buhen─the greatesht warlord Hingashi has ever sheen! The founder of Suenokuni!
target: TEXT_STMBDZ119_02669_DRANKER02669_000_001<tab>S-Sieh doch ... <hicks> ... Die Statue von General Zuiko vom Clan der Buhen ... der Begründer der Provinz Sue!

source: TEXT_STMBDZ119_02669_DRANKER02669_000_002<tab>Let's shee... How many yearsh ago were it that he...<burp>...were Lord of Suenokuni...
target: TEXT_STMBDZ119_02669_DRANKER02669_000_002<tab>Wie lange ist es her ... <rülps> ... seit der große Zuiko aus Sue ... äh?

source: TEXT_STMBDZ119_02669_TEAHOUSE02669_000_003<tab>Excuse me there, <var 08 E905 ((milady)) ((milord)) /var>. Would you please do something to cool off this hot-headed drunkard?
target: TEXT_STMBDZ119_02669_TEAHOUSE02669_000_003<tab><var 08 E905 ((Fremde)) ((Fremder)) /var>, bitte hilf mir. Dieser Mann ist nicht ganz klar im Kopf und braucht eine kleine Abkühlung.

source: TEXT_STMBDZ119_02669_TEAHOUSE02669_000_004<tab>I've just now sent a teahouse hireling to fetch some water from the well. If you are able to find her, ask her for a pail of cold well water. I'll do what I can to keep this ale-soaked sod from bothering the other patrons until you return.
target: TEXT_STMBDZ119_02669_TEAHOUSE02669_000_004<tab>Der Knecht unseres Teehauses holt gerade Wasser vom Brunnen. Lass dir bitte von ihm <var 32 ((EventItem)) 02F61E8DA3020502 /var> geben. Ich kümmere mich solange noch um den Betrunkenen.

source: TEXT_STMBDZ119_02669_TEAHOUSE02669_000_005<tab>I've just now sent a teahouse hireling to fetch some water from the well. If you are able to find her, ask her for a pail of cold well water. I'll do what I can to keep this ale-soaked sod from bothering the other patrons until you return.
target: TEXT_STMBDZ119_02669_TEAHOUSE02669_000_005<tab>Der Knecht unseres Teehauses holt gerade Wasser vom Brunnen. Lass dir bitte von ihm <var 32 ((EventItem)) 02F61E8DA3020502 /var> geben. Ich kümmere mich solange noch um den Betrunkenen.

source: TEXT_STMBDZ119_02669_DRANKER02669_000_006<tab>And thish here'sh the besht part of all. There were... There were... Damn it all. What were I jusht about to shay?
target: TEXT_STMBDZ119_02669_DRANKER02669_000_006<tab>Warte, ich hab's gleich <schluck> ... also, äh ... was wollte ich gerade sagen?

source: TEXT_STMBDZ119_02669_APPRENTICE02669_000_010<tab>That drunkard is at it again, is he? Well, I've got just the thing for him. Here, take this pail of cold well water and give his head a good dousing. That always seems to do the trick.
target: TEXT_STMBDZ119_02669_APPRENTICE02669_000_010<tab>Schon wieder ein Betrunkener? Hier, nimm den Eimer und gieß ihm das kalte Wasser über den Kopf. Das wird ihn wieder zur Besinnung bringen.

source: TEXT_STMBDZ119_02669_APPRENTICE02669_000_011<tab>Take that pail of cold well water and give that drunkard's head a good dousing. That always seems to do the trick.
target: TEXT_STMBDZ119_02669_APPRENTICE02669_000_011<tab>Gieß dem Betrunkenen das kalte Wasser über den Kopf. Das wird ihn wieder zur Besinnung bringen.

source: TEXT_STMBDZ119_02669_DRANKER02669_000_020<tab>Oh no, I've gone and got good and drunk again, aren't I? I'm sho shorry. It'sh jusht, I were a graveguard for the branch family of a branch family of a branch family of Clan Buhen, I were.
target: TEXT_STMBDZ119_02669_DRANKER02669_000_020<tab>Oh, habe ich mich schon wieder daneben benommen? Tut mir wirklich leid. Das geziemt sich nicht für einen ehemaligen Grabwächter der Buhen.

source: TEXT_STMBDZ119_02669_DRANKER02669_000_021<tab>My love of the drink got me to where you shee me now. I didn't never mean to bother nobody. I'm shorry. Sho very, very shorry.
target: TEXT_STMBDZ119_02669_DRANKER02669_000_021<tab>Der Alkohol ist an allem schuld, aber ich wollte ... niemanden belästigen. Ich bitte um Verzeihung.

source: TEXT_STMBDZ119_02669_TEAHOUSE02669_000_022<tab>Go ahead and dump that pail of cold well water square on that drunken mummer's head!
target: TEXT_STMBDZ119_02669_TEAHOUSE02669_000_022<tab>Gut, gieß ihm das kühle Wasser mit Schwung über den Kopf!

source: TEXT_STMBDZ119_02669_TEAHOUSE02669_000_030<tab>Thank you for your trouble, stranger. I hate to admit it, but as prominent and well-to-do an establishment as our Umineko Teahouse is, we do find ourselves a close neighbor to the Hostelry. Drunkards are not as few and far between as we would like.
target: TEXT_STMBDZ119_02669_TEAHOUSE02669_000_030<tab>Vielen Dank für deine Hilfe! Das Umineko-Teehaus ist ein beliebter Treffpunkt und liegt direkt vor dem Gasthaus. Da lassen sich solche Zwischenfälle nicht vermeiden.

source: TEXT_STMBDZ119_02669_TEAHOUSE02669_000_031<tab>But that's not to say their lot is all bad. There are many whom the drink drives to be quite generous. Those souls are always willing to part with a pretty gil to buy whatever tea and sweets we recommend.
target: TEXT_STMBDZ119_02669_TEAHOUSE02669_000_031<tab>Der rege Betrieb hat aber auch seine guten Seiten, denn wenn die Gäste viel trinken, achten sie nicht mehr so genau auf ihre Gilbörse und bestellen reichlich Reisklöße.

source: TEXT_STMBDZ119_02669_TEAHOUSE02669_000_032<tab>That is just one of the many reasons why I have come to love this city. I hope you come to grow as fond of it as I have. Good day to you, then!
target: TEXT_STMBDZ119_02669_TEAHOUSE02669_000_032<tab>In Kugane ist immer etwas los, deswegen gefällt mir die Stadt so gut. Du wirst hier sicher eine schöne Zeit verbringen. Bis bald!
